channel.title: Printing a .pdf that is too large
channel.description:
Yep another question. I have an image in a .pdf file that I want to print. But that image is bigger then a normal A4 piece of paper. In paint or whatever program it cut's the image into parts and prints them on seperate pages. But Adobe reader won't do that. I can choose to scale it to fit it into one page, but I wan't it full size. And when I choose the option "no scaling" it just prints the left top corner of the image. So is there a way to print the complete image on multiple A4's?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Printing a .pdf that is too large
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Try something other than adobe reader (which is horrible!) Since it sounds like you are on windows use Foxit Reader

Read full topic
